nodes.bodyText: Yeah, would reset() be needed to clear PreparedStatements in 'statementCache' associated with this connection being closed?
Would returning here be okay too? Since db end points are sorted by writable property, remaining ones might be read-only ones.

You may want to use ofNullable here. of will throw an NPE if lastException is null.
Or an old style lastException != null ? lastException : noWritableEndpointException
I wonder if there are constants for the mysql driver properties anywhere.
